name: cookingsymbols
tagline: This LaTeX package provides cooking symbols for typesetting recipes
body:
The sym­bols are de­fined us­ing METAFONT. 

# Symbols
* oven
* top heat
* bottom heat
* top and bottom heat
* fan oven
* gas stove
* dish
* fork
* knife
* spoon
* gloves

[http://www.ctan.org/pkg/cookingsymbols](http://www.ctan.org/pkg/cookingsymbols)
